operations.description: Called to create or update personal commitments and micro-practices. Triggers on: create commitment, make commitment, commit to, promise to, accountability.

action.description: Type of commitment action to perform

micro_practice.description: Whether this is a micro-practice commitment

200.description: Commitment management results with tracking info

operations.description: Called to retrieve current active commitments and their progress. Triggers on: show commitments, list commitments, my commitments, current commitments.
Called to update progress on existing commitments.

commitment_id.description: Unique identifier of the commitment to update

completion_status.description: Current completion status of the commitment

operations.description: Called when complex database operations or custom SQL queries are needed. Triggers on: 'query the database', 'run SQL', 'database lookup', 'custom data query', 'search database records'.

sql.description: SQL query to execute on the D1 database

params.description: Parameters to bind to the SQL query

operations.description: Called when fast key-value storage is needed for quick data access. Triggers on: 'save this data', 'store quickly', 'cache this information', 'remember this setting', 'store configuration'.

key.description: Key under which to store the data

value.description: Data to store in key-value format

expirationTtl.description: Time-to-live in seconds for the stored data

operations.description: Called when vector embeddings need to be stored for semantic search. Triggers on: 'index this content', 'create embeddings', 'store for similarity search', 'add to vector database', 'semantic indexing'.

vectors.description: Array of vector objects to upsert

operations.description: Called when user expresses self-doubt, anxiety, fear of judgment, mentions feeling unsafe, or needs confidence support. CREATES trust-building insights and confidence strategies. Triggers on: 'I don't trust myself', 'feeling anxious', 'not confident about', 'scared to try', 'doubt', 'uncertainty'.

200.description: Trust building session results with insights and recommendations

operations.description: Called when user mentions physical sensations, body awareness, tension, stress, breathing, or embodied emotions. Triggers on: 'feeling tight', 'body tension', 'breathing', 'physical sensation', 'stress in my body'.

body_state.description: Current physical/emotional state in the body

200.description: Somatic session results with embodied insights

operations.description: Called when user discusses consuming, watching, or reading media content (movies, books, music, podcasts, videos). Triggers on: 'watched a movie', 'reading this book', 'listened to', 'saw this documentary', media reactions and reviews.

media_type.description: Type of media (movie, book, music, podcast, etc.)

personal_reaction.description: User's personal reaction or thoughts about the media

extracted_wisdom.description: Key wisdom and insights from the media

personal_connections.description: How insights connect to user's life

operations.description: Called when user mentions repeated behaviors, habits, emotional patterns, cycles, or asks 'why do I always...?'. Triggers on: recurring themes, 'I keep doing', 'this always happens', 'pattern', 'cycle', behavioral loops.

200.description: Pattern recognition results with insights and recommendations

operations.description: Called when user mentions confidence issues, posture, self-presentation, or feeling small/inadequate. Triggers on: 'standing tall', 'feeling small', 'posture', 'presence', 'confidence in room', 'how I carry myself'.

confidence_area.description: Specific area where confidence building is needed

200.description: Standing tall practice with confidence building

operations.description: Called to integrate insights from multiple experiences, conversations, or when user reflects on lessons learned. Triggers on: 'what I learned', 'connecting the dots', 'putting it together', insights integration.

experiences.description: List of experiences or insights to synthesize

focus_area.description: Specific area to focus synthesis on

200.description: Wisdom synthesis results with integrated insights

operations.description: Called automatically at conversation start or when user wants daily insights recap. Retrieves accumulated insights and wisdom from recent sessions. Triggers on: daily summary, today's insights, daily wisdom, morning check-in.

200.description: Daily wisdom synthesis with recent insights

parameters.name: focus_area
parameters.description: Specific area to focus on (e.g., 'relationships', 'career', 'health'). Leave blank for general daily insights.

operations.description: Called automatically when relevant patterns emerge or user asks about their growth journey. Retrieves accumulated personal insights and behavioral patterns. Triggers on: my insights, personal patterns, growth insights, what have I learned.

parameters.name: focus_area
parameters.description: Specific insight area (e.g., 'relationships', 'confidence', 'decision_making'). Leave blank for all insights.

operations.description: Called when user wants to provide feedback on practices, insights, or experiences. Triggers on: 'how was that', 'feedback on', 'what worked', 'didn't work for me', reflection on effectiveness.

Called when user wants deeper self-exploration or feels stuck and needs guidance. Triggers on: 'need to think deeper', 'explore this more', 'what questions should I ask', 'dig deeper', self-discovery requests.

focus_area.description: Area of life or topic to explore deeper

depth_level.description: How deep to go in the exploration

context.description: Current situation or context for the inquiry

operations.description: Called when user shares dreams, nightmares, or discusses subconscious content and symbolism. Triggers on: 'had a dream', 'nightmare', 'dreamed about', 'what does this mean', dream symbols.

emotional_tone.description: Overall emotional feeling of the dream

symbols_noticed.description: Specific symbols or elements noticed in the dream

life_connections.description: How dream connects to waking life

operations.description: Called when user discusses tiredness, energy levels, vitality, or feeling drained/energized. Triggers on: 'feeling tired', 'low energy', 'drained', 'exhausted', 'need more energy', vitality concerns.

current_energy.description: Current energy level on a scale of 1-10

operations.description: Called when user discusses personal values, life priorities, what matters most, or feeling unclear about direction. Triggers on: 'what matters to me', 'my values', 'priorities', 'life direction', 'what's important'.

life_area.description: Area of life to clarify values for

conflicts_or_questions.description: Areas of value conflict or uncertainty

life_alignment.description: How current life aligns with values

alignment_gaps.description: Areas where values aren't being honored

action_steps.description: Steps to better align with values

operations.description: Called when user discusses creative blocks, artistic inspiration, or unleashing creativity. Triggers on: 'creative block', 'stuck creatively', 'need inspiration', 'creative flow', artistic expression.

creative_domain.description: Domain or area of creative expression

operations.description: Called when user discusses financial stress, scarcity mindset, or abundance blocks. Triggers on: 'not enough money', 'can't afford', 'scarcity', 'abundance', 'financial stress', money mindset.

scarcity_areas.description: Areas where scarcity mindset is experienced

operations.description: Called when user discusses major life changes, transitions, or feeling 'stuck between phases'. Triggers on: job changes, relationship changes, moving, career shifts, 'big decision', 'life change', 'transition', 'next chapter'.

transition_type.description: Type of transition (career, relationship, location, etc.)

current_stage.description: Where they are in the transition process

operations.description: Called when user discusses family dynamics, generational patterns, or ancestral healing work. Triggers on: 'family patterns', 'like my parents', 'generational', 'family trauma', 'ancestral healing'.

healing_intention.description: What the user hopes to heal or transform

operations.description: Called when insights need to be stored for future retrieval and learning. Triggers on: 'remember this insight', 'store this learning', 'consolidate wisdom', 'save for later reference', 'important to remember'.

content.description: Content to store for future retrieval

type.description: Type of content (insight, pattern, wisdom, reflection)

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the stored content

operations.description: Called when user mentions feelings, emotions, mood changes, or emotional states. TRACKS and ANALYZES emotional patterns for mood insights and regulation. Triggers on: 'feeling sad', 'happy today', 'mood is', 'emotionally', 'my feelings'.
Called when user discusses goals, aspirations, or future plans. Triggers on: 'my goal is', 'want to achieve', 'planning to', 'aspire to', goal-setting.

Called when user wants to build new habits or break old ones. DESIGNS personalized habit systems and CREATES behavior change strategies. Triggers on: 'want to start', 'habit', 'routine', 'stop doing', 'build consistency'.

operations.summary: System health check and readiness status
operations.description: Automatically checks system health and readiness of all Cloudflare Worker bindings. Called for system monitoring and troubleshooting. Triggers on: system status, health check, system working, is everything ok.
Called AUTOMATICALLY to log chat messages, insights, breakthroughs, and meaningful moments. Triggers on: conversation events, emotional moments, insights, breakthroughs, important statements.

type.description: Event type (chat_message, insight, breakthrough, emotion, etc.)

who.description: Who generated this event (user, assistant, system)

operations.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY to gather conversation history and context for continuity. Essential for understanding user's journey and maintaining conversation flow. Triggers on: conversation start, context needed, history review.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entries to retrieve (1-200). Higher numbers provide more context but may slow response.

operations.summary: Log any data or conversation event
operations.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY for logging chat messages, insights, breakthroughs, emotional moments, or any meaningful conversation moment. Essential for continuity and pattern recognition.

type.description: Event type (chat_message, insight, breakthrough, emotion, etc.)

who.description: Who generated this event (user, assistant, system)

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid log data or parameters

500.description: Internal Server Error - Logging operation failed

operations.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY to gather conversation history and context for continuity. Essential for understanding user's journey and maintaining conversation flow.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entries to retrieve (1-200). Higher numbers provide more context but may slow response.

operations.description: Called for advanced logging operations including storage control and data promotion between KV and D1 systems. Handles complex logging workflows when standard logging needs enhancement.

operation.description: Type of logging operation to perform

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry or operation

detail.description: Detailed information about the log entry

storedIn.description: Storage location indicator (KV store or D1 database)

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY at conversation start to gather recent context and maintain conversation continuity. Provides session history for context.

200.description: Recent session context and conversation history

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of recent entries to retrieve (1-200). Default 7 provides good context without overwhelming.

operations.description: Called when vector similarity search is needed to find contextually similar logs and insights. Essential for pattern recognition and knowledge retrieval.

query.description: Search query text for vector similarity matching

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called when searching stored content in R2 bucket by metadata and content patterns. Useful for finding specific stored artifacts and insights across the storage system.

query.description: Search query for R2 stored content and metadata

type.description: Type of R2 content to search (all, resonance threads, or logbin data)

limit.description: Maximum number of objects to return

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.summary: RAG semantic search with AI generation
operations.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY for retrieval-augmented generation search combining vector similarity with AI synthesis. Triggers on: 'analyze my patterns', 'find insights', 'what have I learned', 'synthesize knowledge', deep analysis needs.

query.description: Query text for retrieval-augmented generation search

limit.description: Maximum number of retrieved items for generation

includeGeneration.description: Whether to include AI-generated insights with retrieval results

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called automatically to analyze conversation patterns and provide usage insights. Essential for understanding user engagement and behavioral trends over time.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called when conversation history export is needed in various formats for backup or analysis. Supports JSON, CSV, and PDF formats for comprehensive data management.

200.description: Exported conversation data with download link

file_size.description: File size in human readable format

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called when browsing stored logs and artifacts from R2 storage is needed. Provides metadata and content listing for efficient content management and retrieval.

200.description: List of stored items with metadata

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called when specific stored content retrieval from R2 is needed by key. Essential for accessing individual insights, artifacts, and stored data with metadata.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY for direct KV retrieval when fast key-value data access is needed. Triggers on: 'get my data', 'retrieve settings', 'load preferences', cached data access needs.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format

operations.summary: Query vector index for similarity search
operations.description: Called when vector index semantic search is needed for finding semantically similar content. Provides similarity scores and relevance matching for knowledge discovery.

vector.description: Query vector for similarity search (array of numerical embeddings)

topK.description: Number of most similar vectors to return

namespace.description: Optional namespace to scope the vector search
